tips.text: Creating a new store and need some sample products? Try the `populate` command: https://shopify.github.io/shopify-app-cli/app/rails/commands/#populate
Did you know this CLI is open source? Get involved and learn how to contribute: [github link]
New to ngrok.io? Learn all about it here: https://www.shopify.ca/partners/blog/shopify-admin-authenticate-app
